Lucian Pancrates was an apprentice scholar who lived in the city of Neverwinter during the late 15 century DR.
Lucian studied under the master spellcaster Tualo the Bright.
In the , Lucian was present at Tualos house when the learned master performed a ritual with the use of a tome called Transmogrifications of the Spellplague. The ritual went awry however, as the book had been altered by the malevolent moon elf Rhazzad, opening a portal to the Far Realm. Lucian survived the encounter, but Master Tualo was not so fortunate.
